t: God*pn takes His stand in His own congregation; He*ln judges in the midst of the rulers.
How*ln long will you judge unjustly And*ln show partiality to the wicked? Selah.
Vindicate*ln the weak and fatherless; Do*ln justice to the afflicted and destitute.
Rescue*ln the weak and needy; Deliver*ln them*i out of the hand of the wicked.
They*ln do not know nor do they understand; They*ln walk about in darkness; All*ln the foundations of the earth are shaken.
I*ln said, “You are gods, And*ln all of you are sons of the Most High.
Nevertheless*ln you will die like men And*ln fall like any*i one of the princes.”
Arise,*ln O God, judge the earth! For*ln it is You who possesses all the nations.
